text: Tak and the Power of Juju is a 2003 3D platform video game made by THQ and Avalanche Software for the PlayStation 2, Nintendo GameCube and Game Boy Advance. It had two sequel games in 2004 and 2005 before it became a Nicktoon in 2007. ==Plot== Tak of the Pupanunu people was called by the great shaman Jibolba to free Lok from his imprisonment by summoning the Juju. Category:2003 video games Category:3D platformers Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:Nintendo GameCube games Category:Game Boy Advance games
title: Tak and the Power of Juju
